name: h3
description: Experience the 2025 Marucci Code Drop 10 JBB Baseball Bat, engineered for peak performance with a mid-loaded swing feel that enhances your power at the plate. Featuring a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, this one-piece alloy bat is crafted from the durable USA AZ75 Alloy, ensuring all-season reliability. The sleek black, lime, and white colorway adds a stylish touch, while the 2nd-Gen AV2 Knob delivers a superior feel by dampening vibrations. With its ring-free barrel construction and multi-variable wall design, this bat offers an expanded sweet spot and thinner walls for improved performance, even on off-centered hits. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on ALL Orders
Warranty: Full Twelve (12) Months through the Manufacturer
2nd-Gen AV2 Knob: Harmonic Dampening System for Better Feel
Ring-Free Barrel Construction: Enhances Barrel Flex & Overall Bat Production
Multi-Variable Wall Design: Expanded Sweet Spot and Thinner Walls for More Forgiving Off-centered Performance
